header.title: Air Quality Tracker
header.subtitle: Track air conditions for your location and cities around the world.

error.noLocation: No data available for this location
error.noForecast: No forecast available for this location

0-50.description: Air quality is satisfactory and poses little or no risk.

51-100.description: Air quality is acceptable; however, there may be some health concerns for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.

101-150.description: Members of sensitive groups (such as children, the elderly, and individuals with respiratory or heart conditions) may experience health effects. The general public is less likely to be affected.

151-200.description: Everyone may begin to experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects.

201-300.description: Health alert: everyone may experience more serious health effects.

301-500.description: Health warnings of emergency conditions. The entire population is likely to be affected.

invalid.description: Invalid air quality provided. Please try again.
